name: Small Talk Media
description:
Small Talk Media is a digital marketing agency that helps businesses engage with communities online, build social equity, and go beyond the walls of their business. We believe that conversations and connections are at the heart of any solid marketing strategy. Businesses that pay attention to consumer activity through social networks succeed. Every customer’s voice matters and every brand has a story.
We work collaboratively with businesses to create, implement, and manage social media strategies that create dialogue, build community, and grow.
We are a tight nit group of savvy web professionals that have been digitally marketing businesses since social media’s inception in the early 2000’s.
